sentences.en: " And " , " but " and " whereas " are conjunctions.
Butcons are immediate, whereas menu commands remain relatively slow and hidden.
sentences.cn: 但图标按钮非常直接, 而菜单命令相对较慢,也更沉闷.

sentences.en: He earns 8000 a year whereas she gets at least 20000.
sentences.cn: 他一年挣8000英镑而她至少可获20000英镑.

sentences.en: He had never done anything for them, whereas they had done everything for him.
sentences.cn: 他从未为他们做过任何事，反之他们却为他做了所有事。

sentences.en: Materialists face truth, whereas idealists shun it.
sentences.cn: 唯物主义者面向真理, 唯心主义者则逃避真理.

sentences.en: Pensions are linked to inflation, whereas they should be linked to the cost of living.
sentences.cn: 养老金与通货膨胀挂钩，然而它们其实应该和生活费用挂钩。

sentences.en: She has authentic charm whereas most people simply have nice manners.
sentences.cn: 她散发出真正的魅力，而大多数人只是举止优雅。

sentences.en: Some of the studies show positive results, whereas others do not.
sentences.cn: 有一些研究结果令人满意，然而其他的则不然。

sentences.en: Some people like fat meat, whereas others hate it.
sentences.cn: 有些人喜欢肥肉, 相反有些人讨厌肥肉.

sentences.en: Some people like fatty meat, whereas others hate it.
sentences.cn: 有些人喜欢肥肉, 而有些人却不喜欢.

sentences.en: The old system was fairly complicated whereas the new system is really very simple.
sentences.cn: 旧系统相当复杂，而新系统却很简单。

sentences.en: They preach idealism whereas we advocate materialism.
sentences.cn: 他们讲唯心论，我们讲唯物论。

sentences.en: They want a house, whereas we would rather live in a flat.
sentences.cn: 他们想要一座房子, 而我们宁愿住在一套房间里.

sentences.en: Whereas 10 years ago I would have worried myself to death about it, now I accept it is part of the game.
sentences.cn: 10年前我会为此担心得要命，但现在我接受了它是游戏的一部分。

sentences.en: Whereas gasoline fumes linger close to the ground before dispersing.
sentences.cn: 而汽油烟气却靠近地面迟迟不散.

sentences.en: Whereas I was blind, now I see.
sentences.cn: 我过去双目失明, 现在则重见天日.

sentences.en: Whereas the city spent over $1 billion on its museums and stadium, it failed to look after its schools.
sentences.cn: 这个城市花了十亿美元建造博物馆和体育馆，但是却忽略了对学校的建设。

sentences.en: Whereas West Germans drink wine, their Eastern cousins prefer Schnapps.
sentences.cn: 西德人喝葡萄酒，而他们东德的兄弟姐妹则喜欢喝杜松子酒。

words.tran_cn: 由于,因为,既然,另一方面,虽然

trans.tran_en: used to say that although something is true of one thing, it is not true of another
